original_title: Local Elvis to do it in the US
original_body_lines: Janaka Palapathwala is very much in the news these days, and his local shows have been crowd-pullers.
Janaka recreates the Elvis Presley era, through song, and presentation, and that has made him extremely popular with those who still love the music of the late king of rock ‘n’ roll.
He is now busy working out the itinerary for his tour of America, which is coming up shortly
Says Janaka: “I’m trying to connect the tour cities, together, in order to finalise my travel plans, and airticket.
“Dates in Toronto, Canada, Washington DC, and New York, are in place. Texas and Minnesota are confirmed but not the dates, as yet.
“I’m only waiting for confirmation from LA and San Francisco and then we can finalise the itinerary.
According to Janaka, the New York show is going to be bigger than everything.
